sections.title: 1. What is a cookie?
sections.text: Cookies are small text files stored on your device to help sites function and collect information about your usage.

sections.title: 2. Use of Cookies
sections.text: bugket uses cookies to improve your experience, analyze traffic, and remember your preferences. Some cookies are essential for the site to function.

sections.title: 3. Types of Cookies Used
sections.text: Essential cookies: necessary for the site to function. Analytics cookies: help us understand site usage. Preference cookies: remember your language and other settings.

sections.title: 4. Managing Cookies
sections.text: You can control and delete cookies via your browser settings. Disabling cookies may affect your experience on our site.

homeCards.title: A complete QA, designed for players
homeCards.text: Bugket supports studios on all types of projects: solo, multi, indie or AA+. We adapt our testing methods to each game to guarantee stability, consistency, and performance.

homeCards.title: Tools made for your needs
homeCards.text: Automation, reporting, bug tracking. We develop custom solutions. Our goal: speed up test cycles, detect earlier, deliver cleaner.

homeCards.title: A team in tune with current standards
homeCards.text: Our testers are trained in the demands of modern gaming: multiplayer, crossplay, recent engines, UX/UI... Concrete expertise to meet the technical and creative realities of the market.
